net.canarymod.channels

Interface ChannelManagerInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChannelManager

    public interface ChannelManagerInterface
    Author:
    Somners

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void registerClient(java.lang.String channel, NetServerHandler handler)
      Registers the client to the specified channel.
      void registerListener(Plugin plugin, java.lang.String channel, ChannelListener listener)
      Register a plugins ChannelListener.
      NOTE: the channel cannot be 'REGISTER', 'UNREGISTER', or ''.
      boolean sendCustomPayloadToAllPlayers(java.lang.String channel, byte[] bytestream)
      Send a Custom Payload packet to all players listening on the given channel.
      void sendCustomPayloadToListeners(java.lang.String channel, byte[] byteStream, Player player)
      Send an input Custom Payload packet to the listeners listening on the given channel.

      Send a Custom Payload packet to the given player listening on the given channel.

      Unregisters a client from a Custom Payload Channel.

      boolean unregisterListeners(Plugin plugin)
      Unregisters all listeners for this plugin.

    • Method Detail

      • registerClient

        void registerClient(java.lang.String channel,
                    NetServerHandler handler)
        Registers the client to the specified channel. Cannot be 'REGISTER', 'UNREGISTER', or ''. The Channel used to register these clients are 'REGISTER' and the Channel used to unregister these clients are 'UNREGISTER'.
        Parameters:
        channel - the name of the channel to register the client to.
        handler - the NetServerHandler for the client registering this channel.

      • registerListener

        void registerListener(Plugin plugin,
                      java.lang.String channel,
                      ChannelListener listener)
        Register a plugins ChannelListener.
        NOTE: the channel cannot be 'REGISTER', 'UNREGISTER', or ''.
        Parameters:
        plugin - the plugin registering.
        channel - the channel being registered
        listener - the listener being registered.

      • sendCustomPayloadToAllPlayers

        boolean sendCustomPayloadToAllPlayers(java.lang.String channel,
                                      byte[] bytestream)
        Send a Custom Payload packet to all players listening on the given channel.
        Parameters:
        channel - the channel to send messages on.
        bytestream - the message to be sent.
        Returns:
        true if any packets were sent, false otherwise.

      • sendCustomPayloadToListeners

        void sendCustomPayloadToListeners(java.lang.String channel,
                                  byte[] byteStream,
                                  Player player)
        Send an input Custom Payload packet to the listeners listening on the given channel.
        Parameters:
        channel - the channel the Custom Payload was sent on.
        byteStream - the message being sent.
        player - the player who sent the Custom Payload.

      • sendCustomPayloadToPlayer

        boolean sendCustomPayloadToPlayer(java.lang.String channel,
                                  byte[] bytestream,
                                  Player player)
        Send a Custom Payload packet to the given player listening on the given channel.
        Parameters:
        channel - the channel to send messages on.
        bytestream - the message to be sent.
        player - the player to send the Custom Payload to.
        Returns:
        true if any packets were sent, false otherwise.

      • unregisterClient

        boolean unregisterClient(java.lang.String channel,
                         NetServerHandler handler)
        Unregisters a client from a Custom Payload Channel.
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel the client is listening on.
        handler - The NetServerHandler for the client.
        Returns:
        true if the client was unregistered, false otherwise.

      • unregisterClientAll

        boolean unregisterClientAll(NetServerHandler handler)
        Unregisters the client from all channels it is registered on.
        Parameters:
        handler - The NetServerHandler for this client.
        Returns:
        true if it was unregistered, false otherwise.

      • unregisterListeners

        boolean unregisterListeners(Plugin plugin)
        Unregisters all listeners for this plugin.
        Parameters:
        plugin - The plugin to remove all lisiteners for.
        Returns:
        True if any channels were unregistered, false otherwise.
